channel.title: Editing compile.bat and runserver.bat files in testscape source
channel.description: name explains itself, please help me i dont know how :x

item.title: Editing compile.bat and runserver.bat files in testscape source
item.dc:creator: @niels11 niels11
item.description:
@niels11 wrote:

Rofl,What you guys say is wrong and Josh,You copied it off n0vamage lol,at the last you both got 2 enters before pause lol
Put this in compile (again)

@echo off
title ServerNameHere Compiler
color B
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

And this in runserver :
@echo off
java -cp .;./jython.jar server

~Niels

Read full topic
item.source: Editing compile.bat and runserver.bat files in testscape source

item.title: Editing compile.bat and runserver.bat files in testscape source
item.dc:creator: @Josh Josh
item.description:
@Josh wrote:

It means you havent saved it as a .bat so open a brand new notepad and paste the following

[code]
@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin/java.exe” server

pause[/code]
Now click file/save as/then under file type click all files/and save it under run.bat

Now do the same with the compiler except change the code & filename.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing compile.bat and runserver.bat files in testscape source
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

right click them go to edit and replace whats in that with

[code]@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin/java.exe” server

pause[/code]

and for the runserver.bat add this after clicking edit replace whats in that with

@echo off title TestScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

n0va

Read full topic
